admeta:admProperty.admeta:name: doc-title
admeta:admProperty.admeta:description: Documentation for Venus Doc Format standard meta informations

admeta:admProperty.admeta:name: doc-subject
admeta:admProperty.admeta:description: This section contains documentation for most <info name="key">value</info> of Venus Doc Format

admeta:admChangelog.admeta:description: Added fixed size layout and HTML properties

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: doc-title
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the document title, should be usually supported in document formats like html or pdf

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: doc-author
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the document author, should be usually supported in document formats like html or pdf

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: doc-creator
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the document creator tool (es. Venus Doc), should be usually supported in document formats like html or pdf

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: doc-producer
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the document producer tool (es. Venus Doc), should be usually supported in document formats like html or pdf

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: doc-language
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the document language, should be usually supported in document formats like html or pdf

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: doc-subject
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the document subject, should be usually supported in document formats like html or pdf

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: doc-version
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: A custom property to track meta model version

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: default-table-padding
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set default table padding, default '-1' means 'unset' (shoud be inherited by all cells, in HTML it is handled by 'padding')

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: default-table-spacing
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set default table spacing, default '-1' means 'unset' (shoud be inherited by all cells, in HTML it is handled by 'margin')

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: default-cell-border-width
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set default cell border width for all table cells, default '-1' means 'unset'

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: table-border-collapse
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the default table-border-collapse mode, possible values are 'separate' or 'collapse'. (note that this is a document scoped property, all tables in documnent will be affected)

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: default-font-name
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the default font name

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: default-font-size
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the default font size

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: default-font-style
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Set the default font style

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: suppress-wrong-type-error
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: If set to 'a' or 'true' it will set suppress some type error.

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: table-check-integrity
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Check integrity of table structure, see https://github.com/fugerit-org/fj-doc/issues/480. Allowed values : 'disabled' - no check (default value), 'warn' - report on the log table structure issues as warning, 'fail' - report on the log table structure issues as error and throw a DocFeatureRuntimeException.

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: html-css-link
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Link to css for the html document

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: html-css-style
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Inline CSS style definition to be added to the document

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: html-add-to-head
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Custom HTML code to be added directly in the head section

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: html-charset
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Add meta charset to head

admeta:admSection.admeta:name: meta_fixed
admeta:admSection.admeta:description: Properties specific to fixed size formats (like PDF)

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: margins
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Document page margins, in pixels, in the format LEFT;RIGHT;TOP;BOTTOM

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: page-width
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Page width, in cm, for example 21cm for A4 portrait or 29.7cm for A4 landscape

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: page-height
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Page height, in cm, for example 29.7cm for A4 or 21cm for A4 landscape

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: page-orient
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Page orientation, 'vertical' for portrait or 'horizontal' for landscape

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: excel-table-id
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: This property is required to generate spreadsheet format. It should be a list of ';' separated element. Each element is a key=value set, where 'key' is the id of a table in the document which will be the content of a new sheet, the 'value' is the name of the sheet to be created. i.e. 'table-1=sheet1;table-2=sheet2'.

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: excel-try-autoresize
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: If set to 'true', a column auto resize will be tried on the created sheets.

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: excel-fail-on-autoresize-error
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: If both this property and 'excel-try-autoresize' are set to true, the generation will fail in case of autoresize errors.

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: excel-ignore-format
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: If set to 'true', column format will be ignored and all content will be rendered as string.

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: excel-template
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Path to a template to use as a base for the output. If the prefix is 'file://' will load from file system. If prefix is 'cl://' will load from classlaoder.

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: excel-width-multiplier
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: A multiplier for zooming the width of the generated excel. Base value is '256'

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: csv-table-id
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: This property is required to generate the CSV format. It should be a single id of a table contained in the source document to be rendered as CSV.

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: csv-separator
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: The character separator to be used for the CSV.

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: csv-line-end
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: The line terminator for the CSV.

admeta:admSection.admeta:name: meta_fop
admeta:admSection.admeta:description: Properties specific to Apache FOP PDF format

admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:name: mod-fop-xslt-path
admeta:admMetaInfo.admeta:description: Class loader path to optional XSLT template to apply on transformer. If set fop user agent will use given XSLT in the transformation.
